description: The RansomHub ransomware gang has been using TDSSKiller, a legitimate tool from Kaspersky, to disable endpoint detection and response (EDR) services on target systems. [...]
title: RansomHub ransomware abuses Kaspersky TDSSKiller to disable EDR software

description: Microsoft has released the KB5043064 cumulative update for Windows 10 22H2 and Windows 10 21H2, which includes 6 changes and fixes, including a fix for Bluetooth devices that stop working due to a memory leak. [...]
title: Windows 10 KB5043064 update released with 6 fixes, security updates

description: ​Microsoft has fixed a Windows Smart App Control and SmartScreen flaw that has been exploited in attacks as a zero-day since at least 2018. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Windows Smart App Control zero-day exploited since 2018

description: Microsoft has released the mandatory Windows 11 23H2 KB5043076 cumulative update to fix security vulnerabilities and make 19 improvements. [...]
title: Windows 11 KB5043076 cumulative update released with 19 changes

description: Today is Microsoft's September 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 79 flaws, including four actively exploited and one publicly disclosed zero-days. [...]
title: Microsoft September 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 4 zero-days, 79 flaws

description: Wix.com has announced it will stop providing services to Russian users on September 12, 2024, with all accounts from Russia, including free and premium, to be blocked and their websites taken down. [...]
title: Wix to block Russian users starting September 12

description: Wix.com has announced it will stop providing services to Russian users on September 12, 2024, with all accounts from Russia, including free and premium, to be blocked and their websites taken down. [...]
title: Wix.com to block Russian users starting September 12

description: Microsoft announced that Windows 11 installs reaching the end of support next month, on October 8, will be force-upgraded to Windows 11 23H2. [...]
title: Microsoft to start force-upgrading Windows 22H2 systems next month

description: Understanding endpoint privilege management is key to defending organizations from advanced attacks. Learn more from ThreatLocker on using endpoint privilege management to better secure your org's systems. [...]
title: Navigating Endpoint Privilege Management: Insights for CISOs and Admins

description: After three years of development, the Flipper Zero team has announced the release of the first major firmware version for the portable, customizable digital hacking device. [...]
title: Flipper Zero releases Firmware 1.0 after three years of development

description: The NoName ransomware gang has been trying to build a reputation for more than three years targeting small and medium-sized businesses worldwide with its encryptors and may now be working as a RansomHub affiliate. [...]
title: NoName ransomware gang deploying RansomHub malware in recent attacks
